quiz.question: What is the purpose of puberty?
quiz.optionA: To help us transition in to adulthood
quiz.optionC: To prepare us to reproduce (have children)

quiz.question: Puberty begins at the same time for everyone :
quiz.optionA: True: every person begins puberty at age 11.
quiz.optionB: True: everyone begins puberty at the same time.
quiz.optionC: False: puberty begins when your body is ready and that may vary from person to person
quiz.optionD: False: in fact, some people never go through puberty!

quiz.question: What is an example of a physical change during puberty that BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS experience?
quiz.optionA: Both sexes grow taller during puberty
quiz.optionB: Both sexes find that their skin produces less oil during puberty
quiz.optionC: Both sexes experience menstruation (having a period)

quiz.question: During puberty, we experience physical, social and __________ changes.
Having a crush on someone else is an example of a ________ change during puberty:
Mood swings are:
quiz.optionA: A dangerous medical condition that only affects some people during puberty
quiz.optionB: A sudden change in mood caused by unbalanced hormone levels in the body (and a normal part of puberty)
quiz.optionC: Something that only happens to girls during puberty
quiz.optionD: happens when you sit on a swing while in a bad mood

quiz.question: The two main hormones whose levels increase in the human body during puberty are called:
All girls begin their period at the same time: true or false?
quiz.optionA: False: some girls begin as early as 8 years old, others as late as 15 or 16 years old
quiz.optionB: False, most do not begin until they are 13 or 14
quiz.optionC: False, but most people begin by age 12
